languages.text: "Оковы спадут, и от тирании вашей не останется ничего. Как и от вас". {n}Он говорит без ненависти — ровным тоном идущего на казнь мученика.{/n}
"The shackles will fall, and there will be nothing left of your tyranny. Nor of you." {n}Adalbert speaks without hatred. His even voice is that of a martyr on his way to glory.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Оковы спадут, и от тирании вашей не останется ничего. Как и от вас". {n}Он говорит без ненависти — ровным тоном идущего на казнь мученика.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The shackles will fall, and there will be nothing left of your tyranny. Nor of you." {n}Adalbert speaks without hatred, his even voice is that of a martyr on the way to glory.{/n}

"The shackles will fall, and there will be nothing left of your tyranny. Nor of you." {n}Adalbert speaks without hatred. His even voice is that of a martyr on his way to glory.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Ketten werden fallen, und von Eurer Tyrannei wird nichts übrig bleiben. Und von Euch auch nicht." {n}Adalbert spricht ohne Hass. Seine ruhige Stimme ist die eines Märtyrers auf dem Weg zum Ruhm.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The shackles will fall, and there will be nothing left of your tyranny. Nor of you." {n}Adalbert speaks without hatred. His even voice is that of a martyr on his way to glory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Ketten werden fallen, und von Eurer Tyrannei wird nichts übrig bleiben. Und von Euch auch nicht." {n}Adalbert spricht ohne Hass. Seine ruhige Stimme ist die eines Märtyrers auf dem Weg zum Ruhm.{/n}

languages.text: «Los grilletes se desprenderán y no quedará nada de su tiranía. Ni tampoco de usted». {n}No hay ni el más mínimo odio en la voz de Adalbert. Habla con el tono impertérrito de un mártir a punto de alcanzar la gloria.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The shackles will fall, and there will be nothing left of your tyranny. Nor of you." {n}Adalbert speaks without hatred. His even voice is that of a martyr on his way to glory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los grilletes se desprenderán y no quedará nada de su tiranía. Ni tampoco de usted». {n}No hay ni el más mínimo odio en la voz de Adalbert. Habla con el tono impertérrito de un mártir a punto de alcanzar la gloria.{/n}

languages.text: 「足かせが外れ、お前の暴政に残るものはない。お前自身もな」{n}アダルバートは憎しみを滲ませることなく話す。その平静を装った声は、栄光へと向かう殉教者のそれである。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The shackles will fall, and there will be nothing left of your tyranny. Nor of you." {n}Adalbert speaks without hatred. His even voice is that of a martyr on his way to glory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「足かせが外れ、お前の暴政に残るものはない。お前自身もな」{n}アダルバートは憎しみを滲ませることなく話す。その平静を装った声は、栄光へと向かう殉教者のそれである。{/n}

languages.text: “枷锁必将被斩断。你的暴政必将结束，你也必将不复存在。”{n}阿达伯特的话语中没有任何恨意。他的声音平静，仿佛殉道者踏上了荣耀之路。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The shackles will fall, and there will be nothing left of your tyranny. Nor of you." {n}Adalbert speaks without hatred. His even voice is that of a martyr on his way to glory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “枷锁必将被斩断。你的暴政必将结束，你也必将不复存在。”{n}阿达伯特的话语中没有任何恨意。他的声音平静，仿佛殉道者踏上了荣耀之路。{/n}

languages.text: « Nous briserons nos chaînes, et nous renverserons votre tyrannie. Et vous avec. » {n}Adalbert s'exprime d'une voix monocorde et dépourvue de haine, celle d'un martyre engagé sur la voie de la gloire posthume.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The shackles will fall, and there will be nothing left of your tyranny. Nor of you." {n}Adalbert speaks without hatred. His even voice is that of a martyr on his way to glory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous briserons nos chaînes, et nous renverserons votre tyrannie. Et vous avec. » {n}Adalbert s'exprime d'une voix monocorde et dépourvue de haine, celle d'un martyre engagé sur la voie de la gloire posthume.{/n}

languages.text: "Zincirler kopacak ve tiranlığından geriye hiçbir şey kalmayacak. Senden de." {n}Adalbert nefret dolu konuşmuyor. Kontrollü sesi, görkemli bir sona ulaşmak üzere olan bir şehide ait gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The shackles will fall, and there will be nothing left of your tyranny. Nor of you." {n}Adalbert speaks without hatred. His even voice is that of a martyr on his way to glory.{/n}
